output:
<%
var printers = order.printerProperty.split(' ');
for (var i = 0; i < printers.length; i++){
  printer = printers[i];
%>
  <ticket printer = "<%= printer %>">
    
    Message:  <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.message) %>
    Product Code:  <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.printCode) %>
     Product Quantity: <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.productQty) %>
     Product Description: <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.description) %>
  

  <%
}
  %>
